name: d3-queue
description: Evaluate asynchronous tasks with configurable concurrency.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-queue.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-queue.js -c -m -o build/d3-queue.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp -v README.md LICENSE build/d3-queue.js ../d3-queue-bower && cd ../d3-queue-bower && git add README.md LICENSE d3-queue.js && git commit -m "Release $VERSION." && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." v${VERSION} && git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3-queue && cp build/d3-queue.js ../d3.github.com/d3-queue.v3.js && cp build/d3-queue.min.js ../d3.github.com/d3-queue.v3.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add d3-queue.v3.js d3-queue.v3.min.js && git commit -m "d3-queue ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-queue.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-queue.js build/d3-queue.min.js
